Special Powers
MATTER MANIPULATION: Barrier as FREE, but only to generate 1 marker.

January 24, 2022
spider_ham
The Ultimate Nullifier is the easiest method to get May to click 5 within the first few turns, using the "Call In Help From the Spider-Verse" trait found on multiple other Spider-People. A good slow-burn support character, otherwise.
January 24, 2022
Buckwheat
I always imagined that if this character were made, it would at least be a Rare.
December 27, 2021
gambitrmp
If you really want to get her to that last clix, use her as mastermind fodder. Give the opponent a dilemma, activate her or let the mastermind free. This came to me when I was looking at Deathbird and the old Caliban. Mastermind is potentially a great way to get clix to later dials the opponent might not want to activate.
December 8, 2021
The Singularity
Top dial Prob is great and all, but this dial is just too gimmicky for me to keep. Although... I wonder if One day we will have enough versions of May Parker to play a whole team?
December 7, 2021
Goop
It seems very likely she is going to get hit for 3 and just end up on that weak 4th click. I imagine she will only be as good as that free barrier placement is going to be. If you can frustrate your opponent enough with it they will have to knock her to her stop click where you can do some decent damage.
